synopsis.text: After achieving stardom as a 16-year-old idol singer, Kazuya's life takes a dramatic turn when he becomes the target of a nefarious entertainment agency. Despite his newfound fame and countless adoring fans, Kazuya finds solace in his friendship with Akihiko, a long-time friend who shares his love for video games. However, their bond is put to the test when Akihiko must confront his feelings for Kazuya and protect him from the agency's sinister intentions. As the two friends navigate through dangerous situations, they discover that their connection runs deeper than they ever imagined. Will Akihiko be able to save Kazuya from the clutches of the agency and confess his true feelings to him? Only time will tell in this thrilling and heartwarming tale of friendship and love.
